verbs.description: astronaut shares amazing photo of northern lights from space american astronuaut mark [ARG0: kelly] [V: shared] [ARG1: the shot of chicago minneapolis and other major cities with the northern lights in the background chicago scott kelly astronaut windy city lower peninsula grand rapids michigan minneapolis lake michigan great lakes detroit]
